title: Mental Model Formation
description: An interactive radial diagram showing how mental models form from six sources (Direct Experience, Observation, Instruction, Analogy, Intuition, Cultural Transmission) and influence predictions, interpretations, problem-solving, and communication. Demonstrates the filtering effect of existing models on new information and the feedback loop for model updates.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mental Models
Cognitive Science
Instructional Design
Learning Science
Knowledge Construction
Educational Psychology
relation: Part of the Automating Instructional Design intelligent textbook
coverage: Introduction to mental model formation for instructional designers and educators
learningObjective: Help learners visualize how mental models form from various sources and influence the interpretation of new information
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of mental model formation
